item.title: What We Know About the U.S. Deal for a Weapons Pipeline to Ukraine
item.description: NATO allies will buy arms, then give them to Ukraine, President Trump said.

item.title: Clearer Skies Expected in Northeast as Storms Move Southward
item.description: Lingering showers were forecast in the New York City area, but heavy rain and flash flooding threats were predicted to shift south on Tuesday.

item.title: Blazes in Northern Ireland Recall an Old Message: You Are Not Welcome Here
item.description: A bonfire topped with an effigy of a migrant boat. Homes set alight. During the Troubles, similar tactics were used to target Irish Catholics in the t...

item.title: Trump’s New Ultimatum for Putin, and an Epstein Backlash
item.description: Plus, the origins of an iconic TV theme song.

item.title: Would Europe Actually Retaliate Against Trump’s Tariffs?
item.description: European Union officials have drawn up plans to impose levies on American imports, but questions abound about whether they would go through with them.
